description: This file is the entry point for a React web application. It initializes the app by rendering the root React component into the DOM, setting up React Router for client-side routing, and applying strict mode for highlighting potential problems.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to enable React to manage the DOM rendering of the application.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Render method to start the React rendering process within the specified DOM container.
